description: Number of achiral planar maps on n nodes up to orientation-preserving isomorphisms.
comments: Likely the same as A006443. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 13 2008]
links: V. A. Liskovets, Some easily derivable sequences, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.2.
formula: a(n) = 2*A006385(n)-A006384(n). [Liskovets eq 3a] - R. J. Mathar, Oct 01 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 24 2000
